data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In Tallahassee, Florida, a two-year study was conducted, involving five schools in Leon County. The ____ included ____ who ____ most ____ risk ____ reading ____, ____ on ____ performance ____ screening ____. On a measure of reading accuracy, the groups improved from the 9th percentile in the fall to the 64th percentile in May, as a result of early intervention (Mathes, 2005).
data.partBlankContent: In Tallahassee, Florida, a two-year study was conducted, involving five schools in Leon County. The st___ included stud____ who we__ most a_ risk f__ reading fai____, ba___ on th___ performance o_ screening te___. On a measure of reading accuracy, the groups improved from the 9th percentile in the fall to the 64th percentile in May, as a result of early intervention (Mathes, 2005).
data.answer: 在佛罗里达州的塔拉哈西，一项为期两年的研究在利昂县的五所学校中进行。根据他们在筛选测试中的表现，这项研究包括了阅读失败风险最高的学生。在阅读准确性方面，由于早期干预的结果，这些小组从秋季的第9百分位提高到5月的第64百分位(Mathes, 2005)。
